channel.title: One on One
channel.description: One on One, hosted by Jack Acello and Noah Schwartz, is an all-encompassing basketball podcast, specifically focused on the NBA. Jack and Noah, long-time college roommates, spend much of their free time watching, analyzing, and debating the NBA, and now they get to bring those conversations to the airwaves! Be sure to tune in weekly for some of the best basketball content available!
channel.itunes:author: High Tops Media & Jack Acello, Noah Schwartz

item.title: Social Media Exclusive: Play-In Tournament Night #3 Reaction
item.description:
For our fourth Social Media Exclusive, Jack and Noah go live and give their thoughts on the Pelicans and Hawks advancing to the playoffs.

Don’t forget to follow One on One on Instagram to see these Social Media Exclusives live!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

item.title: Social Media Exclusive: Play-In Tournament Night #1 Reaction
item.description:
For our third Social Media Exclusive, Jack and Noah go live and discuss the 7/8 games of the NBA’s Play-In Tournament as the Nets and TWolves advance into the playoffs.

Don’t forget to follow One on One on Instagram to see these Social Media Exclusives live!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

item.title: NBA Awards, Play-In and First Round Preview, and Frank Vogel "Doesn't Know Sh**"
item.description:
This week on One on One, Jack and Noah discuss the Lakers and Kings disappointing seasons, NBA Awards, Play-In and First Round Preview.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia

item.title: Social Media Exclusive: National Championship Reaction
item.description:
For our second Social Media Exclusive, Jack and Noah go live and discuss the NCAA championship game between North Carolina and Kansas as the Jayhawks came back to capture the title.

Don’t forget to follow One on One on Instagram to see these Social Media Exclusives live!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

item.title: Jazz needs a reboot, Grizzlies cruise right along, and the All-NBA Injured/Excuse teams
item.description:
This week on One on One, Jack and Noah discuss three of the most disappointing teams in the NBA in the Jazz, Lakers, and Nets, as well as three up-and-coming teams that could play a part in the title chase in the Mavs, Grizzlies, and Celtics. Jack and Noah also close out the show with a fun segment, giving out their All-NBA teams for injured and excuse-making players.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

item.title: Social Media Exclusive: Final Four Reaction
item.description:
For our first Social Media Exclusive, Jack and Noah go live with special guest Dean Gutic and discuss the two March Madness semi final game results and give their national championship game preview.

Don’t forget to follow One on One on Instagram to see these Social Media Exclusives live!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

item.title: Final Four Preview, Kyrie wants an extension, Miami struggling TWolves surging, and our picks for All NBA
item.description:
This week on One on One, Jack and Noah give a Final Four preview, talk about Kyrie Irving and a possible contract extension with the Brooklyn Nets, the Miami Heat struggles and Minnesota Timberwolves hot stretch, as well as give their predictions for the All NBA Teams.

Note: At the time of the recording, it had not been reported that Robert Williams on the Boston Celtics had a torn meniscus.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

item.title: March Madness Opening Weekend, a litany of NBA injuries, and our NCAA Tournament Draft
item.description:
This week on One on One, Jack and Noah talk about March Madness Opening Weekend, as well as some big NBA injuries, the recent scoring outbursts by top NBA stars, and a special, all-time March Madness draft of whose squad you would rather have! Be sure to check out @1on1pod on Instagram to vote with us!

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

item.title: Upsets Games, Play-In Preview, and King Popovich
item.description:
This week on One on One, the guys discuss a couple of big upsets over the past week, the Warriors defeating the Bucks, and the Nets defeating the Sixers. They also talk about the current standings in the NBA Play-In Tournament and Coach Popovich becoming the winningest coach of all time.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

item.title: Big Weekend Slate of Games, Most Surprising Teams
item.description:
In the debut episode of One on One, Noah and Jack discuss three of the primetime games from this weekend, the return of Victor Oladipo, and some of the most surprising teams of the season.

Note: The final segment of the episode was recorded prior to Cleveland Cavaliers All Star Center Jarrett Allen breaking his finger.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

item.title: Introducing One on One
item.description:
One on One, hosted by Jack Acello and Noah Schwartz, is an all-encompassing basketball podcast specifically focused on the NBA. Jack and Noah, long-time college roommates, spend much of their free time watching, analyzing, and debating the NBA, and now they get to bring those conversations to the airwaves! Be sure to tune in weekly for some of the best basketball content available!

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media
